text: Dominik Köpfer and Denis Kudla were the defending champions but only Köpfer chose to defend his title, partnering Andrew Harris. Köpfer lost in the first round to Martin Joyce and Jeffrey John Wolf. Tommy Paul and Peter Polansky won the title after defeating Gonzalo Escobar and Roberto Quiroz 6–3, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ==References== * Main Draw Columbus Challenger - Doubles
title: 2018 Columbus Challenger – Doubles
